title: Look Up - Novel Updates
tags: Handsome Male Lead   Modern Day   Sadistic Characters
author: 空心節竹
description: His double-sided personality is perverted, and his energy is dull and awkward. Let’s look at how Jin Yichen, who has a double-sided personality, can dismantle Wu Xiao bit by bit.  After five years, Wu Xiao and Jin Yichen reunited, and the innocent and lovely little tail in memory has changed too much; his gentleness now is no match to him at the beginning . He is innocent, and the only thing that remains unchanged is his clingy characteristics.  Wu Xiaoxin was pleased with Jin Yichen’s return and was enjoying life with friends, but over time, he found that under Jin Yichen’s gentle  surface, there was a madness that almost swallowed him…>
